resources.string: If you enjoy the app, you can support me by donating!
If you enjoy the app, you can support me by watching \n an advertisement!
If you have any suggestions, bugs or issues to tell \n me about, you can contact me by clicking the button!

Thank you for downloading my application! This was made by a student in his spare time. If you encounter any bugs, issues or you have suggestions or feature you would like to see, please contact me using the button below! Don\'t immediately low star it please! There are no ads displayed without your consent, so if you enjoy it, consider watching an advertisement on your own accord or consider donating to help me keep it free. Have a great day!
